scripts.env:android: npm install -g detox-cli && npm install -g react-native-cli && npm install
scripts.env:ios: brew tap wix/brew && brew install --HEAD applesimutils || echo 'appleSimUtils exists '&& npm install -g detox-cli && npm install -g react-native-cli && npm install
scripts.detox:android: react-native start --port 2137 & detox build -c android.emu.debug && detox test -c android.emu.debug && kill -9 $(lsof -n -i4TCP:2137)
scripts.detox:ios: react-native start --port 2137 & detox build -c ios.sim.debug && detox test -c ios.sim.debug && kill -9 $(lsof -n -i4TCP:2137)

ios.sim.debug.build: xcodebuild -project ios/PolideaSample.xcodeproj -scheme PolideaSample -configuration Debug -sdk iphonesimulator -derivedDataPath ios/build
ios.sim.debug.name: iPhone 7
